summary:
this mod offers an upgrade to the werewolf and the vampire lord
Aggiornamento per le due trasformazioni  del gioco
descriptionHtml:
Upgrade for the two transformations of the game ...
is compatible with all languages
New version 1.12
 requires only 1.9 patch and Dawnguard

This mod changes all werewolf and all vampire , not only player .
V 1.12 
this version is completely done from zero 

------------------------------ version 1.12:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requires only Dlc Dawnguard and 1.9 patch

Description :

-Serana fix when follower UespWiki : (While Serana is your follower if you use Vampiric Drain as a Vampire Lord the spell\'s damage decreases dramatically. This is the result of a condition on the Damage Health effect of the spell; if Serana is following you, the Damage Health effect will be reduced to zero points for all levels of the spell and only the Drain Health, Magicka, and Stamina will take effect. )

-Vampire drain increased damage 

-Vampire lord drain increased damage 

-Vampire Lord weakness to fire increase a 55 %

-Vampire lord  cold resistance increase a 55 %

-Vampire lord unarmed damage increase 40 %

-Vampire lord increase health + 200 ,magicka + 400 

-Vampire lord regen magicka 3 %

-Vampires servent increased level 


-Werewolf increased health +200 magicka +400 

-Werewolf increase damage resistance in all levels

-Werewolf unarmed damage + 80 %

-Werewolf regen stamina 4 %

-Werewolf magicka resistance + 20 %

-----------------------------------------------------V 1.1-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requires all Dlcs and 1.9 

Description
                                       
- Serana fix ,when follower
- Vampire drain damage increase
- Serana drain damage increase
-Vampire lord drain damage increase
-werewolf health regen 0.5 %
- werewolf increase health and stamina 
-  vampire lord claws damage increase
- vampire lord  increase regen magicka 
- werewolf claws increase damage
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

next version :
tree perk werewolf and vampire lord 
power 
maybe :
new encounters in skyrim and solstheim
retexture
 modifies some npc


                                           INTALLATION

                        insert esp on data  and load the last

Note : this mod not use  script / nou usa script
sorry for my bad English  I\'m Italian
